entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning with rain showers changing to flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
